attributes.action: Publicly recognise John Rae as the founder of the Northwest Passage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Futher to my petition he should be posthumously knighted. I cannot believe in over 160 years this has not happened. The statue of Sir John Franklin located at Waterloo Place, sw1 is a travesty. Sir John Franklin did not find the northwest passage and any inscriptions bearing this falsehood should be removed or rewritten. 

The only reason John Rae is not recognised is because of what he wrote regarding the Franklin expidition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
